The Twist Accent Chair features a bold, contemporary design with curved armrests and a distinctive twisted silhouette. Upholstered in premium charcoal grey fabric, it adds a modern touch to any space.

Built with high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship, featuring supportive cushioning and durable construction for long-lasting comfort.
